scripts.local:api: npm run build:sam && sam local start-api
scripts.local:hello: npm run build:sam && AWS_SAM_LOCAL=true sam local invoke "getHelloFunction" -e "./events/get-hello.json"
scripts.local:rebalance: npm run build:sam && AWS_SAM_LOCAL=true sam local invoke "rebalanceFunction" -e "./events/rebalance.json"
